mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.REWARD_SYNOPSIS,B.REWARD_SHORT_NAME,B.REWARD_REPRESENT_IMAGE,B.REWARD_MC_NAME FROM TB_REWARD_ADVERTISEMENT A INNER JOIN TB_REWARD B ON A.REWARD_NO=B.REWARD_NO WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN REWAD_ADVERTISEMENT_START_DATE AND REWAD_ADVERTISEMENT_END_DATE ORDER BY REWAD_ADVERTISEMENT_START_DATE DESC
